Instruction: Preheat the outdoor grill to medium-high heat and lightly coat the grate with oil.
Combine brown sugar and cinnamon in a bowl, whisking until well mixed.
Transfer to a large resealable plastic bag. Add the pineapple wedges to the bag and shake vigorously to ensure each wedge is coated.
Grill the pineapple wedges on the preheated grill until warmed through, about 3 to 5 minutes on each side.
